content: strawberry amigurumi key this pattern uses us ​ terminology treble_crochet- treble_crochet half_double_crochet-half_double_crochet decrease-work one stitch over the space of two increase- two stitches in one space slip_stitch- slip_stitch chain-chain f/o-fasten_off you will need 4 5 mm crochet hook ​ ​ pink green & light yellow worsted weight yarn yarn needle stuffing sewing pins part 1- berry 1 in a magic_ring make 6 half_double_crochet 6 2 repeat *half_double_crochet increase* around 9 3 repeat *2 half_double_crochet increase* around 12 4 repeat *3 half_double_crochet increase* around 15 5 repeat *increase 3 half_double_crochet* around in next stitch increase in next half_double_crochet in final stitch increase 20 6 repeat *4 half_double_crochet increase* around 24 7 repeat *2 half_double_crochet increase* around 32 8 half_double_crochet around 32 9 repeat *6 half_double_crochet decrease* around 28 at this point sew the seeds on with light yellow yarn 10 *half_double_crochet decrease* around final 3 stitches are decreased as one stuff the berry ​ 11 decrease around f/o with long tail and close up the top opening loosely try to weave the yarn into itself to cover the hole left after the final round it doesn t have to be neat because the leaves will cover it part 2- leaves 1 leave a 5 inch tail for sewing chain 4 skip 1st chain and single_crochet to end 3 2 chain 3 & slip_stitch into bottom of the stem bottom is the end with the tail hanging off 3 chain 1 make 8 half_double_crochet in the ring and into the bottom of the stem this is a little tricky but if there is still a hole we will sew it later slip_stitch to top of first half_double_crochet 8 4 chain 1 repeat *single_crochet increase* around slip_stitch to top of first single_crochet 12 5 repeat *chain 4 treble_crochet in same st chain 4 slip_stitch into next 2 stitches* around 6 leaves f/o and leave a long tail for sewing use sewing pins to center and hold the leaves to the top of the berry you can easily attach the leaves with 6 stitches one in between each of the pairs of leaves enjoy your strawberry -ediblewishez12
